Class Board

java.lang.Object
Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class is a representation of the game board. A 3x3 board where it tracks moves made, checks for a win, and if its full.
Author:
bmiller38

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      List</int[]> representing the valid moves (row by col)

    • boardFull

      public boolean boardFull()
      Checks if the game board is full using method validMove
      Returns:
      boolean true if board is full, false otherwise

    • checkWin

      public char checkWin(char letter)
      Checks to see if the specified player has won the game
      Parameters:
      letter - the letter representing the player ("X" or "O")
      Returns:
      char representing the winning players letter or blank if no winner

    • makeMove

      public boolean makeMove(int[] gameMove, char letter)
      Makes a move onto the game board for the player/computer
      Parameters:
      gameMove - the move to make onto the baord (row and col)
      letter - the letter ("X" or "O") to fill in that space
      Returns:
      boolean true if the move was made, false if no move was made
